behavior __goal__():

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Ensure the shirt is placed inside the sink for washing

        if exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to wash the shirt

        wash(shirt) 
        # Key step of the behavior, used for washing the shirt

        if exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it off after washing

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select the dirty shirt to be washed
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select a sink to wash the shirt

        wash_shirt(shirt, sink) 
        # Execute the wash_shirt behavior to clean the shirt

behavior wash_shirt(shirt: item):
    body:
        achieve dirty(shirt) # Ensure the shirt is recognized as dirty before washing
        wash(shirt) # Wash the shirt to achieve cleanliness

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) # Identify the shirt as a clothing item
        wash_shirt(shirt) # Execute the behavior to wash the shirt

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior clean_shirt(shirt: item):
    body:
        if is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt):
            achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Bind the shirt that needs to be washed
        
        clean_shirt(shirt)
        # Execute cleaning the shirt
